sourcesContent: export default function AddressInput (props) { let position; let nameSet; let style; if (props.stage === 1) { nameSet = { address1: 'address1', address2: 'address2', city: 'city', state: 'state', zip: 'zip' } } else if (props.stage === 2) { nameSet = { address1: 'billing_address1', address2: 'billing_address2', city: 'billing_city', state: 'billing_state', zip: 'billing_zip' } } (props.stage === 2) ? position = {gridRow: '10 / span 5'} : position ={}; if (props.state.submitFail) { if (!props.state.userInput.address1) { } style = {border: '.3vh solid red'} } return ( ) }
